message:
Using your library in 2017 for UWP app and think it is just gold.

Not sure why people worried about "only UI thread" limitation. I didn't run into a single case where I would need to update it outside main thread. When domain designed properly then mutable state (trigger properties) normalized to absolute minimum. As for async/background processing, mutable state simply should be updated before or after await i.e. in UI context. Same goes for Rx subscriptions that update or access the state.
